title: Creamy curried squash and mango soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee', '1 shallot, minced', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 squash, seeds removed and diced', '750ml chicken or vegetable stock', '1 mango, stone removed and diced', '1 stalk lemongrass, minced', 'salt', 'pepper', '150ml double cream']
